Pre-Game Insights: The Cleveland Guardians are on a three-game winning streak and have won the first two games in the series against the Kansas City Royals.
The Kansas City Royals have lost seven games in a row and have allowed 11 runs in the two games against the Guardians.

The projected starting pitcher for Cleveland is Ben Lively, who has allowed two earned runs in two of his last three starts, while the projected starting pitcher for Kansas City is Seth Lugo, who has allowed four earned runs or more in three of his last five starts.
